data.text:
I am  so happy to have visited the Baron Hotel again since 2018 was the last visit. I hope I will like it as much as I did last time. I will stay for 3 night with my family  start tomorrow  10 April  to 14 april and i  I am exiting to see the changes that have occurred in the hotel
Ahmed Ashour
data.title: Baron hotelðŸŒ¹

data.text:
We stayed from 18/03/2024 - 29/03/2024 in room 2106 
This is our second visit to The Baron Palace and again it was outstanding from start to finish.
The staff are exceptional, every single one of them, they can't do enough for you and are all so friendly and helpful.
We tried all the A'L Carte Restaurants on an evening - outstanding, the food was amazing in all of them.
Drinks were good and plentiful and served by wonderful people.
All reception staff were extremely helpful in making dinner reservations and also helping us upgrade our room to a swim up room before we arrived.
Our cleaner was outstanding the room was kept immaculate. 
The laundry service is amazing
We would like to thank everyone of you for making our holiday special and looking after us once again, you are truly amazing people.
We hope to see you all again next March.

Thank you & Take Care Love Kevin & Janice x
data.title: Amazing

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Greetings from the sunny Baron Palace â€“ Sahl Hasheesh! By this opportunity we would like to forward you our utmost thanks for issuing such an overwhelming and lovely review regarding your recent stay at our hotel. Your lovely comments about our facilities and our employees were really touching us and reflecting our continuous efforts to provide our valued guests with the most wonderful and relaxing vacation experience. Looking forward to welcoming you soon once again at our resort.
Kindly accept our warmest regards from the Red Sea shores.

Osama Ali
General Manager
owner_response.author: Osama  Ali

data.text:
If you are looking for a super chilled luxury holiday, I highly recommend the Baron Palace. (I am not sure if it was extra quiet due to the month of ramadan).
The grounds are beautiful and spotless -and  its much bigger than the pictures online show. 
I can't fault anything in my personal experience.
From the moment we arrived the staff were excellent, in particular i want to highlight Sam on the front desk who was always professional yet personsble and willing to help or offer advice on any thing - I did find the bed a bit hard for my taste and he has the hotel very quickly added a topper and extra duvet.
Olivia in guest relations always made sure to check in with us and to make sure we were enjoying our stay.
Food was great.
Beach was great - the water is incredible..
The spa is fabulous too, we did a hamam x massage treatment and be sure to ask for Esra if you want a strong and firm massage. She was soooo good!!!
I didn't want to do a full tour day so
We took a private short boat trip from the hotel to do some snorkeling and it was a highlight!
All in all, I would highly recommend this resort ðŸ‘Œ ðŸ˜€
data.title: Chilled Bliss...

data.text: Dear Baron team, congratulations! Excellent services and a great relaxing experience for our group of 8! From the moment we stepped in, we were warmly greeted, check-in was done quickly. The room was spacious, very clean (many thanks Reda for keeping it perfectly clean every day). I would like to congratulate you all, beginning with the gardener, the busy waiters around the beach and pool, from the staff at the restaurants, spa, pool, everybody who made our stay a perfect holiday. Special thanks to the managers for selecting such a great team!
data.title: Baron Palace - excellent holiday!

data.text:
Excellent five star hotel, extremely clean, spacious rooms and super friendly attentive staff. Our room number was 169, a family suite on the ground floor with a terrace overlooking the pool and the sea.

Our room cleaner was very intensive, he took a real pride in his cleaning work with nothing too much trouble.

All of the restaurant staff are extremely helpful and very, very friendly. We ate in every restaurant, but we all agreed our favourite was the Mexican inspired restaurant, absolutely top quality food. In second place was the Egyptian restaurant, again, superb quality food. 

All staff at the front of house, concierge and bar staff are very polite and very helpful.

The buffet food quality is excellent, we ate in there two nights out of the seven. Lunch at the seafood Grill next to the beach with amazing views, I can highly recommend the beef medallion

The alcoholic drink selection is pretty good, I mostly stuck to red wine in the evening, I would mark this 8 out of 10 

Most evenings, we would sit in the lounge area next to the reception with a live pianist playing while sipping a cocktail, so relaxing and so quiet.

Unfortunately, one week before we arrived, I had emergency hand surgery which meant I could not swim in the pool of the sea, but nonetheless a week of amazing rest and great sleep .

Weâ€™ve stayed at a lot of nice hotels around the world and Baron Palace definitely is up there with one of those nice hotels. Will we return? Absolutely. Hopefully we shall visit again this summer to enjoy some swimming.
data.title: Excellent Quality Hotel - Very Peaceful Week - Will Return
